channel.title: Hit Counter ?gahh this would be helpful
channel.description: could some one make a simple script that counts how many hits you deal. I.E. (you have a crystal bow and u want to count 240 shots. = P ) that would be super helpful. Im kinda training my range and i really hate counting out the shots/ kills while im traing with the Cbow = )

item.title: Hit Counter ?gahh this would be helpful
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

xD I know that’s what you meant I just couldn’t explain it very well,
If you hit 12, you get 48.
It’s the same as hitting with any other bow\weapon
4 xp per damage,
It’s not fixed

(I am only 99% sure of this)

Read full topic
item.source: Hit Counter ?gahh this would be helpful

item.title: Hit Counter ?gahh this would be helpful
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Nashi:

Nah you can hit any amount and it’s still normal exp per hit

I still dont think you fully understand the concept of ‘fixed xp’.
Simpler terms:
Do you get the same amount of experience no matter what number of damage is dealt?
example: You hit a 12 and get 100 xp. You hit a 3 and get 100xp. A ‘0’ and get 100xp.
etc.

I dont play runescape, so I wouldn’t know.

Read full topic

item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

[quote=“Nashi, post:3, topic:170395”]Yes I tried thinking of ways too, I’ve had this problem with my cbow when I used to play and had money xD

It’s just 250 shots per 10th of the bow and you can hit anything even 0’s and it counts

There’s no reliable way I can think of though =/[/quote]

But is the xp a fixed amount?
You could just have scar check xp for 240 shots worth.
